content.question: By the late seventeenth century, witchcraft trials and executions had declined in western Europe in part because of

choices.label: popular uprisings and peasant resistance against persecution
official church rejection of the concept of witches
increased disbelief among elites in the concept of witches
a declining number of women practicing midwifery

content.answer: increased disbelief among elites in the concept of witches

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
